description:
Mong installs a Danger Avoidance Program into Maximix that he gets from his friend Ixtinguix, the Bubble Town Fire Chief. But when Ixtinguix starts acting strangely the Botties suggest that he come to the Annual Robot Inspection at Town Hall for a checkup. The strange behavior turns into flame-throwing.
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: 火事だ火消しだ! コンボック
